summary:
Having worked as a certified public accountant, accounting manager, controller, CFO, and VP F&A, I have built rich, in-depth knowledge and experience that spans the full finance and accounting functions in several companies across a variety of industries. My creativity, analytical skills, and integrity are important drivers in what I do. Creating and delivering results that go beyond expectations is my hallmark. Excellent communication skills and a talent for “making the complex simple” is how I approach the financial function within an organization to help it run efficiently and effectively. On a personal note, I am a practicing musician and composer and that contributes to keeping an excellent balance between business life and personal life. High-level consultancy (partner level or C-suite level) for (clients of) auditing firms, high-growth start-ups in any of the industries mentioned below is what I am interested in. I like to be challenged to step up in situations/projects/assignments that are qualified as “difficult” by others and where I can use my professional experience to the fullest extent.

Contact: wm.phillippe@gmail.com



Keywords:
-Venture Capital Funds
-Start up companies
-early stage companies
-SOX compliance (Sarbanes Oxley)
-Auditing
-Assurance
-Financial reporting
-performance improvement

projects.title: Smart Business Article
projects.description: How to take a risk-focused approach to SOX compliance

profile_positions.description:
Main responsibilities:
•	Create business opportunities for the firm and contribute to practice development.
•	Develop proposals in draft and Statements of Work (SW) for prospective clients.
•	Define scope, budget, timeline, reporting and staffing requirements for audits.
•	Manage client audit projects from planning through issuance of financial statements.
•	Support client companies that are in process for M&A and/or fundraising.

Results: 
•	Successfully developed a prospect, submitted a proposal and secured a large recurring engagement for a (100+ entities) audit project (and developed a comprehensive audit program) in the venture capital industry.
•	Implemented a series of tools, and development initiatives (including training and marketing collateral) that resulted in a focused package to attract, sell, and close new clients for the Audit & Assurance Group within Sensiba.
•	Realigned and optimized the SOX consulting service offerings to contribute to creating revenue opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Main responsibilities:
•	Contribute to business development for auditing and SOX consulting projects.
•	Define scope, budget, timeline, reporting and staffing requirements for audits and SOX consulting projects.
•	Write proposals for audits and SOX projects including SW for, among others, early revenue stage software technology firms, venture capital limited partnerships, and medical device companies. 
•	Optimize SOX service offerings through enhancement of risk assessment and walkthrough procedures.
•	Develop and lead inhouse training sessions on internal controls, walkthrough procedures and provide ongoing development for staff members.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Audit & Assurance

profile_positions.description:
Main responsibilities:
•	Create a business framework focusing on establishing a new business group within Audit & Assurance focused on delivering SOX support services.
•	Develop and implement process and procedure documentation related to implementing SOX.
•	Build internal financial controls and procedures for public companies and for start ups and high growth private companies. 
•	Advocate, on behalf of clients, in support of SOX objectives with their external auditors.
•	Coordinate development of internal procedures and documentation requirements for clients as required by external auditors.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Main responsibilities:
•	Co-develop and design the business strategy for the company to implement an aggressive market expansion plan.
•	Execute the P&C cycle including risk management, budgeting, sales forecasting, production scheduling, strategic and financial planning).
•	Build contacts and relationships with internal and external stakeholders (investors, banks, distributors).
•	Develop the financial reporting infrastructure and a KPI dashboard.
•	Align KPIs and metrics to monitor (financial) performance and increase better understanding of and for the business.
•	Manage all activities in accounting and administration, HR, IT, purchasing and operations.
•	Review performance of the operating units to identify and implement continuous improvement. 
•	Organize monthly reporting meetings with the Board of Directors to provide updates on KPIs.

Results: 
•	Developed and implemented initiatives based on business performance that improved operational efficiency within the finance function and that conserved the limited financial reserves. 
•	Planned, managed, and executed the relocation of the company from Napa CA to San Francisco CA, resulting in improved operating capabilities.
•	Improved cash flow by collecting delinquent accounts totaling a considerable amount in annual revenue.
•	Initiated and coordinated preparation of private placement offering memorandum and collateral materials for a series C equity round.
•	Evaluated and selected a new operating system to accommodate business expansion.
•	Presented operational metrics and key data to the Board of Directors along with business plan recommendations.
profile_positions.title: Vice President Finance and Administration

profile_positions.title: Various positions
